Questions 9200af1a79cb Value: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?
Questions F6d5d1c2d738 Value: Under which category does that issue fall?
Questions Db10ff019c5a Value: What makes that such an important issue to you?
Responses 9200af1a79cb: Cancel LAX's plan to move runway
Responses Db10ff019c5a: I want L.A.'s next mayor to have the courage to stand up to the downtown business interests and unions and cancel LAX's fiscally risky, billion dollar pork-barrel plan to dig up and move a perfectly useful runway. Since that money has to be spent at the airport, it should be used instead to improve terminals and creating efficient rail transportation into, out of and around the airport to ease hte gridlock on the 405 freeway, Century, Sepulveda and Lincoln Boulevards. National Airport, O'Hare and San Francisco have great rail connections right into the aiport and Oakland is building it. Why not LAX?

Responses Db10ff019c5a: I am a teacher who cares very much about the education of ALL young people in this city. Not just the wealthy, white.

Questions 9200af1a79cb Value: If you could tell L.A.'s next mayor to resolve one issue, what would it be?
Questions F6d5d1c2d738 Value: Under which category does that issue fall?
Questions Db10ff019c5a Value: What makes that such an important issue to you?
Responses 9200af1a79cb: Create Competition And Choice Among Cable and Internet Vendors
Responses Db10ff019c5a: some third-world countries, where customers pay much less, have faster internet connection than los angeles.  having fast reliable cheap internet access is important to our future.  without more competition, we will never get better internet for cheaper.  most of LA is captive to a single cable provider for rather mediocre Internet connectivity.  (verizon has stopped building FIOS and DSL is awful.)  somewhat related, wireless connectivity and 4G LTE coverage on the westside is poor, too.  Verizon is acceptable, but it is almost the only viable vendor here, too.  please auction off an additional 3 licenses to reach individual houses.  google may be interested---they have done nice fiber in kansas city.
